Dear SC Community,
Effective immediately all meals at Superior Central will be free to all students! This was announced by the United States Department of Agriculture today. It is important that families still fill out their free and reduced lunch applications and return them to school as soon as possible as the Michigan Department of Education told us today that the free meals will only last until December 31, 2020 or until all of the funds for this program are exhausted. Once this program ends we will go back to charging normal meal fees. Have a great night!

It has been 89 days since we all stepped foot in the school together. Although this year didn't end the way that we had planned, I am proud of our school community. I don't really know how to properly thank the staff, students, parents, and the entire community for the support that was shown over these last few months. We certainly are a resilient crew.

We have a great school, and although we currently don't know what next year will look like, I am hopeful that we will be back in the classroom teaching and learning. Like most of you, I too, have a hard time dealing with the uncertainty. As more information comes from the State I will pass it along to you. Keep an eye on your email, our website, and our Facebook page for updates over the summer.

I am proud serve this district. I am thankful that we have such an amazing group of students, parents, and staff.

Have a great summer!

Bill Valima
Superintendent/K-12 Principal

When it gets signed, we’ll go through it and make a plan. Everyone hold tight, I know it’s stressful, especially for our Seniors and their parents. Here’s the thing, we’ve never done this before. I know everyone wants answers immediately; especially because of the high demand, technologically driven, 24/7 access to everything/everyone world we live in. That’s not going to happen at this moment in history. I promise, I will get you every answer that I can. Just please, give me time.

Thanks,

Mr. Valima

Once we receive more information, we will get it to you. Until then, treat the next 3 weeks like we are on a really long Spring Break.
As always if you have any questions, please let me know.

Sincerely,
